page.title: 16RELIGION IN BRAMPTON
page.content:
{ESPLAND HILL METHODIST CHAPEL}looks a tiny building half a mile east of Brampton.The Sunday service draws 8 adults & 1 child from within a 1 mile radius.There is a membership of 15. Annual Special Services are the Chapel Anniversary & the Harvest Thanksgiving each with a sacred concert on the Sat- urday before,with capacity audiences of about 90 people.Proceeds finance improvements & expenses.There is an adjoining kitchen & cloakroom.Recently the electric central heating was re- wired for Â£300.An electric organ, bought 2 years ago cost Â£460.
{CHURCH}Brampton comes with Long Marton Parish under a rector shared by 2 other parishes _ 5 villages in all,& a round trip of 8 miles.The churches are all 3 miles apart & a weekly Sunday service is held in each.
